name: .AVHD File Extension
summary: Learn about .AVHD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In most cases, you will not need to open an AVHD file. The changes tracked within an AVHD file will be merged into its parent VHD file when you shut down your virtual machine, and the AVHD file itself will be deleted.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
